string-array.name: Instructions
string-array.item:
"1. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together buttermilk,
 hot sauce (optional, for added flavor), salt, and pepper in a mixing bowl.
 2. Pour the vegetable oil in a skillet until it is about 3/4 inch deep. Heat to 350 degrees. 
 3. Prepare the breading by combining the flour, cornstarch,
 onion powder, garlic powder, oregano, basil, white pepper, cayenne pepper, paprika, and salt.
 4. Mix it thoroughly. Place the breaded chicken into the 350 degree oil. Fry each piece for 14 minutes."

string-array.name: Ingredients
string-array.item:
"* 6 chicken thighs
* 3 cups buttermilk
* 1/2 cup Buffalo Hot Sauce (optional)
 * 2 teaspoons salt
* 1 teaspoon pepper "
